```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(metafor)
library(readxl)

# Parameters
data_file <- here::here("data/L&L Data Set Means SDs.xlsx")

```

## Reading in data

```{r}
# join checks
read_xlsx(data_file, sheet = "VR") %>% 
  select(AUTYR) %>% 
  drop_na(AUTYR) %>% 
  anti_join(
    read_xlsx(data_file, sheet = "StudyChar") %>% 
      select(AUTYR) %>% 
      drop_na(AUTYR),
    by = "AUTYR"
  )
```
